sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './ApartmentHeader.scss' export function ApartmentHeader(props) { console.log('props in apartmentHeader', props) const flat = props.flat const name = flat.host.name const [firstName, lastName] = name.split('') return (

flat.title

flat.location

{flat.tags.map((tag) => { // Cozy - Canal - Paris 10 return {tag} })}

{firstName} {lastName}

★ ★ ★ ★ ★
) }
